import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Router from "next/router"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; const { useState } = require("react"); export default function ShareThought() { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); async function submit(event) { event.preventDefault(); await fetch("/api/thoughts", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ message }) }); Router.push("/"); } return (

); }
